summary: This document is an NCIC (National Crime Information Center) delayed response page from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, dated December 11, 2019. It indicates a search was conducted for a protection order file based on a Social Security number, but no record was found. The document contains security warnings regarding the proper handling of NCIC information.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: Listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency issuing the NCIC response.

events.title: NCIC Protection Order File Inquiry
events.description: A search of the NCIC Protection Order File was conducted based on a Social Security number, but no matching record was found.

locations: Alfred E. Smith Building, Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: An NCIC search for a protection order file based on a Social Security number was conducted on or before December 11, 2019.
The search returned no record (NO NCIC PROTECTION ORDER FILE RECORD).
The document contains strict warnings about the unauthorized release of NCIC information, citing federal regulations.
The inquiry originated from the US Department of Homeland Security - ICE - Federal Protective Service (ORI: NYFPSOOSO).
The document is part of the Epstein case files, suggesting a background check or inquiry related to the investigation.
